description: Try our easy to follow 4-Ingredient Leftover Apple Tarte Tatin recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: 4-Ingredient Leftover Apple Tarte Tatin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove tarte from oven and loosen edges with a knife. Cool for 2 minutes. Invert a large serving plate over pan and carefully flip over to turn out the tarte tatin. Serve hot with thickened cream, if you like.
